title: Another Vayne skin? Is it just me or are they just milking a dead cow at this point?
body:
As the title said, I just want to know your opinion. I do not think this skin will have much success since she already has an unlimited amount already. Do not get me wrong, it looks nice, but she has skins ten times better, and this after what I have experienced with it brings nothing new if I got to be honest.

But, I could be wrong, that is why I ask.

GL HF
